title: What songs can you recommend when moving on or wanting to forget someone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Try the song “above and below” by the bravery Also I know everyone has their own opinion, but I love soundgarden, Audioslave, and pretty much everything that has chris cornell in it. I hold all of his songs even closer to my heart now that he's gone & I think everyone should know Chris Cornell. RIP Chris Hopefully this helps you

There are so many songs, to name a few: Liberty walk by Miley Cyrus [one of my favorites]New rules dua lipaHum jeelenge from murder 2 ( hindi)Let's break-up from love you zindagi (hindi)Don't hurt yourself by BeyonceIt don't hurt like it used to grace CarterDon't bother by ShakiraApologize one republic (the best song ever)Tears dry on their ownWe are never getting back together Taylor swiftIt is the most exciting phase of life. Make it memorable😁😁 Good luck.
